text: Im having a serious issue with uploaded files in the design manager. They are missing the urls are 404s

Hey <@U504BHZ6K>, could you confirm if these are files uploaded to the File Manager, or if they are files uploaded through the Design Manager showing up in the File Manager (which should not be happening)?
Actually they are uploaded via HubDB image fields but into the File manager...i could be wrong.
These must be form submissions. They will stop appearing when we finish the migration that’s in progress. Probably not for a few months though. Can you share your portal id for me to verify this?
Am I the only one experiencing issues with Desing Manager? Today it's taking almost most of my CPU and RAM #wtf?
Not today, but the other day had an issue with FF where I couldn’t drag and drop modules into the page. Just wouldn’t move out of the left nav.
Working now after a browser restart :slightly_smiling_face:

Hi there - anyone know if there is a way to add a title for an author on the authors blog page? I know if you edit the author you only have option to have the name and bio, but I need
Display Name
Title
Author Bio

Thanks!
